title: Star Wars, the D&D edition, would have been a galactic travesty – Lucasfilm have dodged a bullet
text:
Decades from now it will surely go down as one of geekdom’s great unanswered questions: what might a Star Wars trilogy by the duo behind Game of Thrones have looked like?

Would Darth Vader or one of his evil successors have shoved a child out a window, for instance? Given Game of Thrones’s track record with canoodling twins, could we have whooshed back in time for a new perspective on the Luke-Leia relationship (they did briefly snog in Empire Strikes Back). And would it all have fallen apart horribly in the final instalment? (then we already have Return of the Jedi, so no need to go there a second time).

These questions will now hang in the void after David Benioff and DB Weiss announced they...
description: Decades from now it will surely go down as one of geekdom’s great unanswered questions:
